titleStmt.title: A True relation of the extraordinary thunder and lightning, which lately happened in the north as it was sent to Dublin in several letters to persons of quality : with the sad effects of the fall of a cloud.

notesStmt.note: Also published in 1680 as a broadside under title: A true and perfect relation of the extraordinary and terrible thunder and lightning which happened in the North of Ireland, June 26th, 1680.
Reproduction of original in: Cambridge University Library.
